features: DURABLE & WATERPROOF: Men messenger bag is made of superior crazy horse cowhide leather and water resistant canvas for long-term use. Disordered wrinkles and scratches on surface create a vintage and wild looking.

PLENTY ROOM FOR ORGANIZING: This leather messenger bag has 9 pockets to meet your various need. 5 outer pockets and 4 inner pockets for putting your bottle, umbrella, cards, wallet, laptop and anything in their right position.
REMOVABLE & ADJUSTABLE STRAP: Shoulder strap of canvas messenger bag is detachable and can be adjusted at the most suitable length. Padded handle and strap are also helpful to ease your fatigue.

CONVENIENT MAGNETIC SNAP & PADDED LAPTOP SLEEVE: Laptop messneger bag is double secured by magnetic snaps and zippers. Inner padded laptop sleeve fits for 15.6 inch laptop and cohesive seal ensure it to be steady.

DIMENSION: The external dimension of this briefcase is 15.1"L * 4.3"W * 12.2"H. Laptop sleeve dimension: 15.0"L * 9.5"W.It is a messenger bag which is good for college, business, work, travel, overnight, etc.
body.description: * This laptop messenger bag is a perfect satchel bag you don't want to miss. Made of crazy horse leather and detailed with disordered wrinkles and scratches, this canvas messenger bag will make wearer stand out of all, as it presents the style of retro and wildness and form a special skin effect to make it the first choice in major brands. * Briefcase is designed with plenty room of 9 pockets, ends chaos and keeps everything in their right position. You can also take your laptop in it for business, everyday, overnight and other situations, as there is padded laptop sleeve will protect your computer. * Satchel bag has multiple usage, you can carry this business briefcase by the handle, wear on the shoulder as sling bag, or put it accross your body to be crossbody bag. Feature Material: Cowhide leather & Canvas Color: Brown / Grey Structure Details * Outer: - 1 back pocket with zipper for significant articles; - 2 slip pockets for accessories you want to get quickly; - 2 side pockets for bottles and umbrella; *Inner: - 2 inner slip pockets for small gadgets; - 1 large padded compartment for laptop; - 1 large compartment for other things. Dimension * Messenger bag: 15.1"(L) * 12.2"(H) * 4.3"(W) * Laptop sleeve: 15"(L) * 9.5"(W) * Shoulder strap: 34.0"- 48.6"(L) * 1.5”(W) Package includes *1 x Leather Messenger Laptop Bag *1x adjustable strap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent find
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this because my third cheap backpack in the last two years ate the dust. The zippers were sticky, the fabric was splitting at the seams, and I looked like a schoolboy. It was time for an upgrade, this time favoring quality and (hopefully) a bag that will last a long, long time.I decided I ought to buy myself a nice bag for my daily carry. There are many messenger bags around, but what brought me to purchase this one was how characteristic it was. Rather than monochrome brown or black leather, this bag comes in a few colors and have lovely leather straps and buckles. Reviewers seemed favorable, and I really couldn't find a better bag in a sub-$100 price range.When it arrived, it was really tightly squashed into a thin box, so I was initially worried that it was smaller than I had hoped. I carry around a 12.9" iPad, laptop and a sketchbook, so I really need lots of space.The bag opens easily enough. The front buckles are decorative and actually fasten via a magnet. Another reviewer mentioned that the carrying handle and straps were designed in a way that make the handle useless, but the flap remains closed and secure with my daily carry when I use the handle on the top of the bag.I'm glad to say that, luckily, there's space a-plenty. The front pockets leave plenty of room for a 5-600 page novel, a pencil pouch, a journal, or a water bottle. Or a tasty snack. A sandwich fits, so 🤷‍♂️ go crazy.There's a large "main" pocket protected by a zipper. Suitable for biology textbooks, a binder of any width, assorted "lost to the ether" items (chapstick, pencils, cough drops, pennies), or anything else that goes in and out of the bag the most.The main pocket has two inline pockets for things like earbuds, a glasses case, medication, device chargers, or anything else that fits in a generous jeans pocket.On the furthest side of the main pocket, there is a padded section with an elastic band for your electronics. It fits my gigantor iPad and laptop just fine.Finally, there is a nice wide zipper pocket on the back side of the bag. It has a tendency to carry the weight of your devices and to bump against your hips as you walk, so it is probably most suitable for a thin paperback, pamphlets you never wanted, or evelopes you never intend to open.It is a very nice (and nice-looking) bag and clearly is made with quality materials that I hope will last a few years, at least. I would hate to buy an uglier bag! 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice bag for the money. Good quality and lots of room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basically my dream messenger bag: stylish, pockets for everything, durable, versatile.
reviews.reviewText: I've had this bag for a bit over a year now (normally I don't come back and review products so much later but I'd reviewed something else and noticed this in my options to review and thought since I'd had it so long and it's still holding up I'd throw a review out there). I bought it after my mother bought this same bag - I saw hers (which has held up equally well to everything she puts it through for work), loved the design (I've always loved messenger bags but it always seems tough to find a nice-looking one), and had been thinking I could use a new laptop bag. I'm a freelance writer - this bag has traveled with me to libraries and coffee shops as I write my articles. It has pockets for everything, I can fit my planner, tablet, a reporters' notebook, billfold/wallet, folding over-the-ear headphones, pack of gum, water bottle, pens, assorted papers and notes, laptop and cord all inside. This bag will fit a roughly 15-inch laptop - if you have anything past probably 15.6/16 inches, you'll likely need a slightly bigger bag (if you're one of those people with a 17-inch behemoth of a laptop, it probably won't fit in this, at least not easily). Looks-wise this bag is absolutely gorgeous, a classic, rugged look, my bag is brown so I don't know what the other colors look like, but the brown is a beautiful, versatile color that goes with everything. The only thing I'd improve is the water bottle pockets on the side of the bag. They're fine but it'd be great if they were a bit more open/a bit wider perhaps - if I'm taking a water bottle (lately reusable but not always) somewhere, I usually have to make sure the bottle goes in the bag before the laptop to get everything in smoothly and easily. I will say this bag definitely holds up! Summary: Gorgeous, durable, well-made, versatile bag, definitely worth it, can hold everything and then some - I'd always wanted a good-looking messenger bag and something like this was basically my dream bag. Oh, and I forgot to add - the strap is removable so if you want/need to unclip it and just carry it like a brief case that's an option. Also, I really don't get why a gender-neutral item like a bag is branded as "men's" because this design definitely has universal appeal!
Color, tela y tamaño muy cómodo, espaciosa la verdad muy buena

Excelente calidad, materiales que se sienten duraderos y resistentes, una laptop convencional cabe sin problemas junto con otros artículos. La correa ajustable tiene buen tamaño. Suficiente cantidad de bolsas interiores para varios objetos.
only bdrawback is its weight which is quite heavy
I'm really impressed with this item. Looks stylish. Strong, waterproof.Better than I expected

reviews.reviewTitle: Value for money. Good quality with good amount of compartments.
reviews.reviewText: A well made high quality leather messenger bag. I have paid three times this price to get a bag where the strap got worn out.After using it almost daily for a month, I have to say that it is durable and performs well in light rain as well.
